etymology.description: Combines 八 (speech) + 口 (mouth) + 人 (person) to convey the idea of speech or exchange.
etymology.interpretation: The character evokes the act of exchanging spoken words between people, emphasizing communication.

examples.chinese: 我想要兑换货币(我想要兌換貨幣)。
银行提供货币兑换服务(銀行提供貨幣兌換服務)。
examples.english: The bank offers currency exchange services.
